elements.title: [PICK] Korean Dramas Slated to Premiere in February
elements.contents: Edited by Hong Hyun Jung Translated by Esther Lee It looks like the Beijing Olympics will have an effect on the broadcast schedule of dramas slated to premiere in February.

elements.title: TREASURE to Hold Their First-Ever Concert Both Online and Offline
elements.contents: TREASURE will hold their first concert at the Olympic Hall on April 9th and 10th. According to YG Entertainment, TREASURE will put on their first concert at the Olympic Hall.
